dcterms:description: The by-publisher corpus contains 750K articles which were automatically classified based on a categorization of the political bias of the news source. This dataset was split into a training set of 600K articles and a validation set of 150K articles.
dcterms:title: By-Publisher Corpus

dcterms:description: The by-article corpus contains just 645 articles which were labelled manually.
dcterms:title: By-Article Corpus

dcterms:description: The evaluation dataset consists of 628 articles which were labelled manually for the final evaluation.
